simulator module¶

class simulator.Simulator(game, player, stake=100, init_duration=250, samples=50)¶

Bases: object

gather()¶

Executes the number of game sessions in samples. Every session returns the duration and the maximum stake value in the session. These two metrics are appended to the durations list and the maxima list. The durations and maxima lists are printed on stdout.

session(debug=False)¶

One or more cycles. The session begins with a player having their full stake. A session ends when the play elects to leave or can no longer participate.
